ygData.subject: Re: Hi
ygData.msgSnippet: I would be more than happy to help you by providing helpful advice, insight, and referrences to links via this message board. I do not know how much actual
ygData.messageBody:
I would be more than happy to help you by
providing helpful advice, insight, and referrences to links
via this message board. I do not know how much actual
physical help I could give you. Maybe a few plat or
something to get rolling. That's only if you play on my
server though (Brell).<br><br>As for your comment on
people killing you, nobody can actually attack you
unless you play on one of the PvP servers, Rallos,
Vallon, or Tallon Zek. If you do decide to play on Rallos
Zek, let me know because I have an old level 12 guy
there that I do not use any more. You could have all
his stuff.<br><br>Since you have never played EQ
before, I would NOT suggest starting on one of the PvP
servers. They can be somewhat frustrating for
beginners.<br><br>Overall I think you will enjoy the game. I know I have
played it non-stop for the last year :)<br><br>Whatever
your decisions may be, best of luck and good
hunting!<br><br><br>Nelmunbar<br>Enchanter on Brell
